title: vEnkaTEsha bEDikombe
sahitya:
vEnkaTEsha bEDikombe krpaye pAlisO


anupallavi

  brahma shankarAdi vandya enage mukti tOriso


caraNam 1    naSTa modalAdantha kaSTa biDiso ninna paTTada rANige hELi padavi koDiso
ISTa bhakta janaroLu enna sEriso I shrSTiyoLu ninna dAsa dAsaneniso
    caraNam 2    uTTu uNDu mikiddella enege hAgiso bombaTTaloLagina hAlu ucciSTa hAkiso 
gaTyAgi sakkare tuppa roTTi uNNiso munde huTTi bahu janmangaLa enage biDiso
    caraNam 3    kiTTagaTTida kabbiNakke puTava hAkiso utkrSTa bangAradoLu enne sEriso 
beTTige ungura mADi enna dhariso svAmi diTTa purandara viTTalane dayadi pAliso
